TopicTitle: When I click the "Launch" button in the VAB, my game gets partially stuck.

Articles.Content:
What I mean by "Partially" is that I can still click on parts, so it has not crashed, but all the buttons look like they were pressed and I cannot do anything.

All my mods are up to date and I have:

Stock KSP

Dark Multiplayer

KAS

Hyperedit.

This has become a problem for me...

Does anyone know how I can fix this?

Thanks, DMSP
No idea DMSP, can you please take a look at the the stickies and post your logs

FY to the OP, in OS X, your KSP log will be found at /Users/{your user name}/Library/Logs/Unity

The file you want is Player.log

The default for the last several versions of OS X is to hide the /Users/{your user name}/Library/ folder in your personal user directory. The easiest way to get to it is to hold down the OPTION key while clicking on Go in the Finder menubar, which will add "Library" as an option to select.

Actually, it is working now...

I'm very confused...

Thanks for helping guys!
